content.text: RUGGLES--Ruth Cain. Mrs. Ruggles, age 93, of Lost Tree Village, North Palm Beach, Florida passed away peacefully at home on Sunday, January 7, 2007. She was the daughter of the late Rolly M. Cain and Dercy Myers Cain, and resided in Wilmette, Illinois before moving to Palm Beach. Mrs. Ruggles was predeceased by her husband of 54 years, Rudy L. Ruggles in 1992, and a daughter, Jean Ruggles Romoser in 1989. Mrs. Ruggles is survived by her fiance, Richard L. Williams of Palm Beach; a son, Rudy L. Ruggles, Jr. of Ridgefield, Connecticut; six grandchildren: Leslie Rylee, Rudy L. Ruggles, III, Christopher Ruggles, Whitney Savignano, Daniel Ruggles and Andrew Ruggles; and six great-grandchildren: Lindsey Ruggles, Thomas Ruggles, Michela Savignano, Preston Rylee, Costas Savignano and Ava Rylee. A memorial service will take place at Lost Tree Chapel, 11149 Turtle Beach Road, Lost Tree Village on Saturday, January 13th at 11:00am. In lieu of flowers, please direct contributions in memory of Mrs. Ruggles to Hospice of Palm Beach County, 5300 East Avenue, West Palm Beach, FL 33407.
content.title: Paid Notice: Deaths   RUGGLES, RUTH CAIN

content.text: ROSENFIELD--Helen Anna, of Brooklyn, New York, died peacefully on Sunday, January 7, 2007 at the age of 95 . She was predeceased by her husband Harry in 1969. She is survived by her son Stephen Rosenfield and his wife Riva Rosenfield, her daughter Mimi Meyers and husband, Gary Mangus, her four grandchildren, Peter Rosenfield, Jonathan Rosenfield, Joan Meyers, and Gregory Meyers, and her two greatgrandchildren, Hannah Rosenfield and Jessie Rosenfield. Funeral services will be held at 12 pm on Wednesday, January 10, 2007 at the Weinstein - Garlick - Kirshenbau Chapels, 1153 Coney Island Ave., Brooklyn, NY, 11230. Active in progressive political causes, Helen was a spirited and compassionate woman who will be missed by her family and friends. In lieu of flowers, contributions may be made to the ACLU Foundation, 125 Broad Street, New York, NY, 10004.
content.title: Paid Notice: Deaths   ROSENFIELD, HELEN ANNA
